Articles.Content:
The challenge is to take a rocket, dip it into jool without burning up or colliding into cloud and return home safely (optional).

 

Rules:

 

1. Obviously no cheaty cheat things (Hyperedit, Debug or hacking the save file)

2. Mods allowed (Optional): Mechjeb, Any timewarp mods, KW Rocketry, Gravity turn & Trajectories.

3. Complete the Hard Challenge and score over 0 points

Challenges:

5pts - Hard- Anything Goes! Have the ship go down=(On the altimeter) 190Km-180Km into the atmosphere then get out ASAP. Recommendation: Many Ablative heatshields

25pts  - Very hard - Get out when the altimeter is 150KM. Still quite difficult.

45pts  - Super hard-  Get out when the altimeter is 100Km

85pts - Ultra Hard - Get out when the altimeter is 50Km. I bet no one will get past this.

100pts - Impossible - Drop in and out when the altimeter is 15Km- -100m. Probably never will be achieved.

Points:

KW Rocketry not used - 1pts

Gravity turn not used - 10pts

Completely stock - 30pts

Only braking the sound barrier(White flames) on entry - 70pts

Slowing down between 100m/s - 0m/s - 100pts.

Going home - 1000 pts

Good Luck!

 

Edited August 9, 2016 by Scientia1423
So to clarify, to count as Gotten out does a ship need to enter Jool orbit or just escape the atmo' for a bit before falling back?
